features: 24-HOUR IMMUNE SUPPORT: Nature's Bounty Immune 24 Hour + contains the only clinically studied Vitamin C with 24-hour immune support from Ester C (1)

SUPPORTS UPPER RESPIRATORY HEALTH: Highly bioavailable Ester-C can increase Vitamin C levels in the body which is important for white blood cell function and contributes to the health of the upper respiratory tract (1)
WITH ELDERBERRY AND ECHINACEA: Nature's Bounty Immune 24 Hour + rapid release softgels contain Elderberry and Enchinecea plus 9 essential nutrients to help keep you healthy (1)
ANTIOXIDANT SUPPORT: For additional immune support Nature's Bounty Immune 24 Hour + rapid release softgels contain Vitamins D and A plus antioxidant Zinc (1)

NON-GMO FORMULA: Nature's Bounty Immune 24 Hour + is Non-GMO and contains No artificial flavor or artificial sweeteners; no sugar; no starch; no milk; no lactose; no soy; no gluten; no wheat; no yeast; no fish; sodium free
body.description: Nature's Bounty Immune 24 Hour + with Ester-C Vitamin C provides advanced, long-lasting immune support to help keep you healthy.(1) With 1,000 mg of Ester-C, the clinically studied immune supporting ingredient, is the only Vitamin C that stays in your white blood cells for up to 24 hours, providing immune support around the clock.(1) Highly bioavailable Ester-C can increase Vitamin C levels in the body, which is important for white blood cell function, as white blood cells play a vital role in the immune system and contribute to the health of the upper respiratory tract.(1) For additional wellness benefits, Nature's Bounty Immune 24 Hour + rapid release softgels contain Vitamin D, Vitamin A, plus Zinc for extra immune and antioxidant support.(1) In addition, the immune-supporting formula is Non-GMO, and free of artificial flavors, artificial sweeteners, sugar, starch, milk, lactose, soy, gluten, wheat, yeast, fish, and sodium. The Vitamin C 1000mg supplement also includes herbal ingredients Elderberry and Echinacea, plus 9 essential nutrients for your overall health.(1) (1)These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Nature’s Bounty: Nearly 50 Years of Trusted Quality At Nature’s Bounty, we are committed to your health. For nearly 50 years we have been making trusted products, backed by science, and made with only the purest ingredients…assured. So you can get the most out of life every day. Our dedication to quality, consistency, and scientific research has resulted in vitamins and supplements of unrivaled excellence.

Last 2x Longer than Regular Vitamin C* Clinically studied to stay in your white blood cells for a full 24 hours.* provides Immune and Antioxidant Support* The immune support product you can trust.* From the #1 Herbal Supplement Brand Popular herbal ingredients from a leader in the category

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Essential Immune Support Made Effortless: Nature's Bounty Immune 24 Hour+
reviews.reviewText: Nature's Bounty Immune 24 Hour+ has been a game-changer for my mother, who requires high dosages of Vitamin C due to an autoimmune issue. This exceptional product provides the immune support she needs, and I couldn't be more satisfied with the results. It is a true testament to the quality and efficacy of Nature's Bounty.One of the standout features of this supplement is its unique 24-hour immune support formula. Unlike other Vitamin C supplements, Nature's Bounty Immune 24 Hour+ is designed to provide continuous support, ensuring that the immune system is nourished throughout the day. This comprehensive approach offers peace of mind, especially for individuals with increased vitamin requirements like my mother.The ease of swallowing these pills has made a significant difference in my mother's supplement routine. The tablets are smooth and compact, making them effortless to take. This convenience has greatly simplified her daily regimen, ensuring that she consistently receives the necessary immune support without any hassle.I am also impressed with the reliability and efficiency of the shipping process. The product arrived as promised, allowing my mother to start her immune-boosting regimen without delay. The commitment to delivering on time further demonstrates Nature's Bounty's dedication to customer satisfaction.The results speak for themselves. Since incorporating Nature's Bounty Immune 24 Hour+ into her daily routine, my mother has experienced a noticeable improvement in her overall well-being. The immune support provided by this supplement has contributed to her vitality and resilience, which is particularly important given her autoimmune issue. We are extremely grateful for the positive impact it has had on her health.In conclusion, I highly recommend Nature's Bounty Immune 24 Hour+ to anyone in need of reliable and comprehensive immune support. This product is a game-changer for individuals requiring high dosages of Vitamin C. With its easy-to-swallow pills and unique 24-hour formula, Nature's Bounty has surpassed our expectations. We are extremely satisfied with our purchase and confident that others will find this product equally beneficial.
